nodes.text: S-4V5 was a protocol droid who worked as a starship components merchant during Great Galactic War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. During the war it ran a stall within the Republic-controlled Shipwright Auxiliary Spaceport on the planet Corellia. S-4V5 had yellow sensors and gold plating. While at its stall it made use of a holoprojector.

S-4V5 first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic which was released in 2011 by BioWare. In the game it serves as a Republic starship upgrades vendor on Corellia. Its location was also marked on a map in the accompanying Prima Games strategy guide.
